short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making applying to jobs easier by auto-filling relevant information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuikApply is an extension designed for those that would like to apply to as many jobs as possible without having to reenter their information each time. After installing the extension, you use the settings page to enter your job-relevant information, such as contact info, your education history, and past experience. Then, head over to any job application page*, and click the autofill button in the extension menu!

*This extension currently only supports job applications powered by Workday.
